survey.title: Help Us Understand Your Agricultural Needs
survey.subtitle: We're conducting market research to better understand farmers' challenges and needs. Your insights are crucial for developing effective AI solutions.
survey.description: This interview will help us understand your agricultural challenges, current practices, and how AI can best support your farming operations.
survey.option1Title: Option 1: Complete Interview in New Tab
survey.option1Description: Open our comprehensive market research interview in a new tab. You can return to this page anytime.
survey.option2Description: Complete the interview directly on this page without leaving the website.
survey.surveyInstructions: Please scroll within the interview area below to complete all questions about your farming practices and needs.
survey.tip: üí° Tip: Use the scrollbar within the interview area to navigate through all questions.
survey.footer: Your responses are confidential and will be used to develop AI solutions that truly address farmers' needs.

cookieBanner.message: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can accept all cookies, reject non-essential ones, or customize your preferences. See our Cookie Policy.

strictlyNecessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
strictlyNecessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to deliver personalized content and advertisements.

privacyPolicy.title: üìÑ Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Cabbo respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal data you share with us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website and services.

dataWeCollect.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.intro: We may collect the following personal data:
items: Contact information: such as your name and email address (e.g., when signing up for our newsletter or requesting early access to our app).
Survey and questionnaire responses: including information about your agricultural activity and related details you voluntarily provide.
Technical data: such as IP address, browser type, and usage data, collected automatically for website functionality and analytics.

purposeAndLegalBasis.title: 2. Purpose and Legal Basis
purposeAndLegalBasis.intro: We process your personal data only when we have a lawful basis to do so under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
items: Consent: for newsletters, early access programs, and voluntary questionnaires.
Legitimate interest: to maintain and improve our website's functionality and security.

howWeUseData.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
howWeUseData.intro: We may use your data to:
items: Send newsletters and updates (with your consent).
Provide early access to our app.
Analyze questionnaire responses for research and development purposes.
Improve our website, content, and services.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your data only with:
items: Trusted service providers (e.g., email delivery services, hosting providers).
Authorities, if legally required.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Retention
dataRetention.intro: We keep your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes stated:
items: Newsletter data: until you unsubscribe.
Questionnaire responses: for a maximum of 3 years.
Technical logs: for up to 3 years.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
items: Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
Withdraw your consent at any time.
Request data portability.
File a complaint with your local Data Protection Authority.
yourRights.contactInfo: To exercise your rights, contact us at:

dataSecurity.title: 7. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.

updates.title: 8. Updates
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with a new "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.message: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

termsOfService.title: üìÑ Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: Welcome to Cabbo! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our site, you agree to these Terms.

services.title: 1. Services
items: Access to information and resources on our website.
Newsletter subscription.
Early access to our app (when available).
Voluntary participation in questionnaires related to agriculture.

userResponsibilities.title: 2. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.intro: By using our website, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and truthful information.
Not misuse our forms or services (e.g., spam, unlawful content).
Respect applicable laws and regulations.

intellectualProperty.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including text, images, and design, is the property of Cabbo unless otherwise stated. You may not copy, reproduce, or distribute it without our prior written consent.

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Our website and services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We are not liable for any damages resulting from your use of the website or participation in our programs.

changesToServices.title: 5. Changes to Services
changesToServices.content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any part of our website or services at any time without notice.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access if you violate these Terms or misuse our services.

changesToTerms.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of our website constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of Italy, without regard to its conflict of laws principles.

contact.title: Contact
contact.message: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

cookiePolicy.title: üç™ Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how Cabbo ("we", "our", or "us") uses cookies and similar technologies on our website.

whatAreCookies.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files placed on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) when you visit a website. They help us improve your browsing experience and enable certain site functionalities.
items: First-party cookies: set directly by us.
Third-party cookies: set by external services (e.g., analytics, marketing platforms).

strictlyNecessary.title: a) Strictly Necessary Cookies
items: Essential for the proper functioning of our website (e.g., saving preferences, ensuring security, enabling forms).
These cookies do not require your consent.

performanceAnalytics.title: b) Performance and Analytics Cookies
items: Help us understand how visitors use our site (e.g., traffic statistics, most visited pages).
We use Google Analytics for this purpose.
These cookies are set only with your consent.

marketingProfiling.title: c) Marketing and Profiling Cookies
items: Used to deliver personalized communication, such as newsletters and campaigns.
We use Mailchimp to manage newsletter subscriptions and related marketing services.
These cookies require your explicit consent.

legalBasis.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
items: Strictly necessary cookies: processed on the basis of our legitimate interest to ensure site functionality.
Analytics and marketing cookies: processed only with your explicit consent.

cookies.name: _ga
cookies.purpose: Tracks user interactions and usage statistics

cookieManagement.title: 5. Cookie Management
cookieManagement.intro: When you first visit our site, a cookie banner will ask you to accept, reject, or customize your preferences.
cookieManagement.browserSettings: You can also manage or delete cookies at any time through your browser settings:
cookieManagement.note: If you disable cookies, some features of the site may not function properly.

updates.title: 6. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, law, or our practices. Updates will be posted on this page with a new "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.message: If you have questions about this Cookie Policy, please contact:

capabilities.name: Precision Agriculture
capabilities.description: Advanced data-driven farming techniques using AI and satellite imagery

capabilities.name: Crop Health Monitoring
capabilities.description: Real-time tracking and analysis of crop conditions using advanced sensors and machine learning

capabilities.name: Resource Optimization
capabilities.description: Intelligent management of water, fertilizers, and other agricultural inputs

useCases.Why (Impact): Cuts input waste and ensures compliance by avoiding banned or misused products
useCases.Features: Species Phenotyping, Agricultural Knowledge Base, Weather Forecast, Soil Evaluation, Crop Growth Model, Geolocalization, Satellite Data, Legislative Knowledge Base, Record Keeping
useCases.How (Inputs ‚Üí AI Workflow ‚Üí Output): Inputs: Soil characteristics (e.g. USDA NRCS Soil Survey API) + crop phenology stage (e.g. EPPO BBCH mapping) + weather forecast (e.g. Open-Meteo API) ‚Üí AI: Rule-based engine + crop-specific nutrient optimization model ‚Üí Output: Tailored fertilizer/pesticide type, dose, and application schedule

useCases.Why (Impact): Increases access to financial support and certifications; reduces bureaucratic barriers
useCases.Features: Geolocalization, Satellite Data, Legislative Knowledge Base, Record Keeping
useCases.How (Inputs ‚Üí AI Workflow ‚Üí Output): Inputs: Farm geolocation and boundaries (e.g. EU LPIS API or national GIS systems) + historical practice records (e.g. FAOSTAT or user-uploaded CSV) ‚Üí AI: Eligibility rules engine + LLM summarizer ‚Üí Output: List of relevant programs + pre-filled application templates

useCases.Why (Impact): Aligns tasks with crop calendars, weather, and markets to optimize timing and maximize output
useCases.Category: Core Agronomic Services, Management & Operations Support
useCases.Features: Species Phenotyping, Yield Forecast, Crop Calendars, Weather Forecast, Geolocalization, Satellite Data, Soil Evaluation, Record Keeping
useCases.How (Inputs ‚Üí AI Workflow ‚Üí Output): Inputs: Satellite-based crop NDVI time series (e.g. Sentinel-2 via Copernicus API) + historical regional calendars (e.g. FAO crop calendar) + local weather (e.g. Open-Meteo API) ‚Üí AI: Sequence model (e.g. LSTM) + rule-based constraints ‚Üí Output: Recommended planting, maintenance, and harvesting windows

useCases.Why (Impact): Reduces water waste and drought stress by tailoring irrigation to local weather, soil, and crop physiology
useCases.Category: Core Agronomic Services, Management & Operations Support
useCases.Features: Species Phenotyping, Agricultural Knowledge Base, Weather Forecast, Geolocalization, Satellite Data, Soil Evaluation, Crop Growth Model, Legislative Knowledge Base
useCases.How (Inputs ‚Üí AI Workflow ‚Üí Output): Inputs: Soil type and water holding capacity (e.g. SoilGrids API) + crop stage (e.g. BBCH via EPPO) + weather forecast (Open-Meteo API) + evapotranspiration rates (e.g. NASA POWER) ‚Üí AI: Crop water-use simulation + scheduling optimizer ‚Üí Output: Daily or weekly irrigation plan with forecast-adjusted volumes

useCases.User Segment: Farm Holders, Cooperatives & Groups, Extension Workers
useCases.Why (Impact): Improves farm operations by tracking inputs, labor, and schedules, while issuing timely alerts from weather, market, and pest data
useCases.Features: Geolocalization, Satellite Data, Commodities Market Forecast, Weather Forecast, Pathogens Alert, Legislative Knowledge Base, Record Keeping
useCases.How (Inputs ‚Üí AI Workflow ‚Üí Output): Inputs: Inventory logs (manual, OCR scan or digital logs via REST) + commodity price updates (e.g. USDA Market News API) + weather alerts (e.g. Meteoalarm) + pest outbreak bulletins (e.g. EPPO Global Database) ‚Üí AI: Event-driven trigger system + task scheduler ‚Üí Output: Personalized action reminders and risk alerts with time-sensitive context

useCases.Why (Impact): Maximizes revenue by forecasting price peaks and advising sale timing
useCases.Features: Yield Forecast, Commodities Market Forecast, Legislative Knowledge Base, Geolocalization
useCases.How (Inputs ‚Üí AI Workflow ‚Üí Output): Inputs: Historical commodity prices (e.g. FAO or USDA Market News API) + forecast trends (e.g. World Bank Agri Commodity Outlook) + current inventory (manual user input, OCR scan or record integration) ‚Üí AI: Time-series forecasting (Prophet, LSTM) + decision thresholds ‚Üí Output: Market timing advice (e.g., "Sell this week" with confidence band)

useCases.User Segment: Farm Holders, Agricultural Experts, Extension Workers, Cooperatives & Groups
useCases.Why (Impact): Prevents yield loss through early detection and treatment
useCases.Features: Species Phenotyping, Agricultural Knowledge Base, Geolocalization, Satellite Data, Human-in-the-Loop
useCases.How (Inputs ‚Üí AI Workflow ‚Üí Output): Inputs: Crop image (user-uploaded or app-integrated, optionally referencing PlantVillage or PlantDoc datasets) + textual symptom description ‚Üí AI: Vision-language model (CNN + VQA) fine-tuned on plant pathology corpora ‚Üí Output: Probable disease/pest name + recommended treatment protocol

useCases.User Segment: Farm Holders, Agricultural Experts, Extension Workers, Cooperatives & Groups
useCases.Why (Impact): Builds collective intelligence across coops or regions; accelerates innovation and community-level resilience
useCases.Features: Geolocalization, Satellite Data, Commodities Market Forecast, Weather Forecast, Pathogens Alert, Legislative Knowledge Base, Human-in-the-Loop
useCases.How (Inputs ‚Üí AI Workflow ‚Üí Output): Inputs: User-generated content (e.g. community Q&A from Agrilinks or GrowAsia forums) + open case study repositories (e.g. CGIAR) ‚Üí AI: Unsupervised topic modeling + LLM-based summarization ‚Üí Output: Region-specific best practices and aggregated peer insights by theme (e.g. drought adaptation, pest response)

useCases.Why (Impact): Enables custom apps, dashboards, and models by exposing high-quality, structured agricultural data
useCases.Features: Agricultural Knowledge Base, Legislative Knowledge Base, Satellite Data, Commodities Market Forecast, Weather Forecast, Record Keeping
useCases.How (Inputs ‚Üí AI Workflow ‚Üí Output): Inputs: External or internal datasets (e.g. national crop stats, satellite imagery, policy rules) + user queries via API ‚Üí AI Workflow: Unified schema mapping + query optimizer + optional LLM for summarization ‚Üí Output: Machine-readable or human-readable response (e.g. JSON dataset, report, chart) via REST or GraphQL

privacyPolicy.title: üìÑ Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Cabbo respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal data you share with us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website and services.

dataWeCollect.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataWeCollect.description: We may collect the following personal data:
items: Contact information: such as your name and email address (e.g., when signing up for our newsletter or requesting early access to our app).
Market research and survey responses: including information about your agricultural practices, challenges, and needs that you voluntarily provide through our Google Forms surveys.
Technical data: such as IP address, browser type, and usage data, collected automatically for website functionality and analytics.

purposeAndLegalBasis.title: 2. Purpose and Legal Basis
purposeAndLegalBasis.description: We process your personal data only when we have a lawful basis to do so under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
items: Consent: for newsletters, early access programs, and voluntary questionnaires.
Legitimate interest: to maintain and improve our website's functionality and security.

howWeUseData.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
howWeUseData.description: We may use your data to:
items: Send newsletters and updates (with your consent).
Provide early access to our app.
Analyze questionnaire responses for research and development purposes.
Improve our website, content, and services.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your data only with:
items: Trusted service providers (e.g., email delivery services, hosting providers, Google Forms for survey data collection).
Authorities, if legally required.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We keep your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes stated:
items: Newsletter data: until you unsubscribe.
Questionnaire responses: for a maximum of 3 years.
Technical logs: for up to 3 years.

thirdPartyServices.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.description: We use the following third-party services to enhance our website functionality:
items: Google Forms: We use Google Forms to collect market research data and survey responses. When you complete our surveys, your responses are processed by Google in accordance with their Privacy Policy. We access this data through Google's secure platform for analysis and research purposes.
Email Services: For newsletter delivery and communications.
Analytics Services: To understand website usage and improve our services.
thirdPartyServices.additionalInfo: These third-party services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them. We only share data with these services as necessary for the specified purposes.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
items: Access, correct, or delete your personal data.
Withdraw your consent at any time.
Request data portability.
File a complaint with your local Data Protection Authority.
yourRights.contactInfo: To exercise your rights, contact us at:

dataSecurity.title: 8. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.

updates.title: 9. Updates
updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with a new "Last updated" date.

items: First-party cookies: set directly by us.
Third-party cookies: set by external services (e.g., analytics, marketing platforms).

items: Essential for the proper functioning of our website (e.g., saving preferences, ensuring security, enabling forms).
